Index.title: Weekly Report Generator
Index.description2: Help you generate complete weekly reports
Index.slogan: Struggling with weekly reports? Let me help!
Index.placeholder: For example: Fixed the bug where coupons couldn't be claimed, designed UI and icons for the new APP for the product department, responsible for following up on the recruitment of frontend engineers in the department
Index.privacyPolicy1: Please do not upload overly private work content, see details in
Index.paragraphFormPrompt:
Please summarize the chat content between <|start|> and <|end|>. Keep it concise and output in paragraph form.

<|start|>
Index.prompt: Please help me fill the following work content into a complete weekly report, output in markdown format with bullet points:
Index.outlineFormPrompt:
Please summarize the chat content between <|start|> and <|end|>. Keep it concise and output in outline form with lists.

<|start|>
Index.notice: Due to the incredible surge in website usage, the author cannot afford the resulting operational costs, so this website will be permanently offline at 2023-02-15 00:00:00. For any questions, please contact via email on GitHub

Settings.title: Settings - Weekly Report GPT
Settings.adminNoLimit: ✅ Admin account, no token usage limit
Settings.userLimit: ⚠️ Regular user, limited to 10,000 tokens per day (unless using custom API)
Settings.useCustomConfigDesc: When enabled, your own API key will be used, without daily token limits

instructionsList.adminNoLimit: • Admin accounts have no token usage limit
instructionsList.userLimit: • Regular users are limited to 10,000 tokens per day
instructionsList.customApi: • Configure custom API to bypass token limits
instructionsList.providers: • Supports OpenAI, DeepSeek, Moonshot, Zhipu AI and other providers
instructionsList.localSettings: • Settings are saved locally in your browser, not uploaded to the server
